title: Mini-Ep 239: Go With The Flowbee
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 239: Go With The Flowbee
itunes:subtitle: Doree is over shopping for underwear and Kamping Kate arrives with a bite from the nature bug. Then, listeners call in with Flowbee horror stories, ask when to best leave a relationship when you share a child, and tsay bonjour (and au revoir) from Fran...
description:
Doree is over shopping for underwear and Kamping Kate arrives with a bite from the nature bug. Then, listeners call in with Flowbee horror stories, ask when to best leave a relationship when you share a child, and tsay bonjour (and au revoir) from France. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter at forever35podcast.com/newsletter!
